data.title: SMART LOCAL 28
data.meta_description: ​ Our goal is to provide the highest quality craftsmen for the Residential, Commercial and Industrial construction industry. When you choose one of our union members, you can be assured you're...
data.text:
Welcome to Sheet Metal Workers Local 28, in New York, NY

​Our goal is to provide the highest quality craftsmen for the Residential, Commercial and Industrial construction industry. When you choose one of our union members, you can be assured you're getting a highly trained professional with the knowledge and skills needed to provide you with top quality craftsmanship.

Come visit STORE28

* Family Picnic Tickets (CLICK HERE)

* Local 28 St. Patrick's Scarf (NEW)

*Navy Blue Beanies with and with no cuff (NEW)

*Black Skull Hoodie (NEW) ​

*Bring The Noise T-Shirts (M,F)

*Black Honor Roll Full Zip

*Flame Black Sweatshirt

*Lime Green Moisture Wick T Shirts

*Red Hoodie with Logo

*Statue of Liberty Polo

*White Engraved Logo Polo

*Celtic Hoodie

We also have some new Items for sale, including:

*Long Sleeve Red Polo with engraved tools- $35

*Local 28 printed cups- $25 each

Breast Cancer shirts- $30 a shirt with all proceeds going to Breast Cancer Research​

Every item we sell is made in the United States and made with Union Labor. ***If purchased items are not picked up within 30 days of the purchase date, a refund will be administered, and the items will be restocked in our store.***
